dcterms:description: The General Video Game AI (GVGAI) Framework provides a game environment with a large quantity of tile-based games, allowing for the creation of levels to train and test intelligent systems.
dcterms:title: General Video Game AI (GVGAI) Framework

dcterms:description: A deterministic version of the GVGAI game used for training and testing the proposed architecture.
dcterms:title: Boulder Dash

dcterms:description: Datasets collected by an agent performing random exploration on the levels, resulting in a total of 100,000 unique samples used to train the CNN.
dcterms:title: Datasets extracted from 200 training levels

dcterms:description: These datasets are used to evaluate the performance of the Deep Q-Planning (DQP) model as more training data is made available.
dcterms:title: Datasets extracted from 10, 25, 50, 100, and 200 training levels

dcterms:description: The DQL model is trained on datasets extracted from the same 200 training levels as DQP, totaling one million unique samples.
dcterms:title: Datasets for the DQL model
